name: serverest-ui-e2e-test-automation
description: Automação de testes E2E para ServeRest UI

scripts.test:all:headed: npm run test:cadastro:headed && npm run test:login:headed && npm run test:cadastro-auth:headed && npm run allure:generate && npm run allure:open
scripts.test:all:chrome: npm run test:cadastro:chrome && npm run test:login:chrome && npm run test:cadastro-auth:chrome && npm run allure:generate && npm run allure:open
scripts.test:all:chrome:headed: npm run test:cadastro:chrome:headed && npm run test:login:chrome:headed && npm run test:cadastro-auth:chrome:headed && npm run allure:generate && npm run allure:open
scripts.test:all:firefox: npm run test:cadastro:firefox && npm run test:login:firefox && npm run test:cadastro-auth:firefox && npm run allure:generate && npm run allure:open
scripts.test:all:firefox:headed: npm run test:cadastro:firefox:headed && npm run test:login:firefox:headed && npm run test:cadastro-auth:firefox:headed && npm run allure:generate && npm run allure:open
scripts.test:all: cypress run && npm run allure:generate && npm run allure:open
scripts.test:all:specs: npm run test:cadastro && npm run test:login && npm run test:cadastro-auth && npm run allure:generate && npm run allure:open
scripts.test:cadastro: cypress run --spec 'cypress/e2e/1-cadastro.cy.js' && npm run allure:generate && npm run allure:open
scripts.test:cadastro-auth: cypress run --spec 'cypress/e2e/3-cadastro-usuario-auth.cy.js' && npm run allure:generate && npm run allure:open
scripts.test:login: cypress run --spec 'cypress/e2e/2-login.cy.js' && npm run allure:generate && npm run allure:open
scripts.test:chrome: cypress run --browser chrome && npm run allure:generate && npm run allure:open
scripts.test:chrome:headed: cypress run --headed --browser chrome && npm run allure:generate && npm run allure:open
scripts.test:firefox: cypress run --browser firefox && npm run allure:generate && npm run allure:open
scripts.test:electron: cypress run --browser electron && npm run allure:generate && npm run allure:open
scripts.test:all:browsers: npm run test:chrome && npm run test:firefox && npm run test:electron && npm run allure:generate && npm run allure:open
scripts.test:all:browsers:headed: npm run test:cadastro:chrome:headed && npm run test:cadastro:firefox:headed && npm run test:cadastro:electron:headed && npm run test:login:chrome:headed && npm run test:login:firefox:headed && npm run test:login:electron:headed && npm run test:cadastro-auth:chrome:headed && npm run test:cadastro-auth:firefox:headed && npm run test:cadastro-auth:electron:headed && npm run allure:generate && npm run allure:open
scripts.test:cadastro:all:browsers: npm run test:cadastro:chrome && npm run test:cadastro:firefox && npm run test:cadastro:electron && npm run allure:generate && npm run allure:open
scripts.test:cadastro-auth:all:browsers: npm run test:cadastro-auth:chrome && npm run test:cadastro-auth:firefox && npm run test:cadastro-auth:electron && npm run allure:generate && npm run allure:open
scripts.test:login:all:browsers: npm run test:login:chrome && npm run test:login:firefox && npm run test:login:electron && npm run allure:generate && npm run allure:open
scripts.test:allure: npm run test:all && npm run allure:generate && npm run allure:open
scripts.test:allure:specs: npm run test:all:specs && npm run allure:generate && npm run allure:open
